channel.title: ETFs on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ETFs on FinanClub

item.title: AMAT
item.description: score:-135 Chances: The semiconductor market is expected to grow by double digits in 2024. A jump in semiconductor equipment spending could supercharge this company that’s trading at an attractive valuation today. Risks: The artificial intelligence (AI) trade is alive and kicking, but there are always risks associated with market fluctuations and technological advancements.

item.title: IVZ
item.description: score:-36 Chances: Invesco Ltd. continues to demonstrate its commitment to providing a better investment experience for its clients by implementing changes to its ETFs. The company is set to release its fourth quarter 2023 results, signaling transparency and accountability to its investors. Invesco’s position in the market may improve as the company explores the potential for launching exchange traded funds tied to the spot price of bitcoin.
